name: Customer Database
description: Primary customer information database including contact details, purchase history, and preferences

name: Employee Records System
description: Complete employee records including personal information, compensation, performance reviews, and benefits

name: Public Website
description: Company public website with product information, blog, and contact forms

name: Financial Reporting System
description: General ledger, accounts payable/receivable, financial statements

name: Product Catalog
description: Product descriptions, pricing, specifications, and images

name: Patient Medical Records
description: Electronic health records including diagnoses, treatments, medications, and test results

name: Internal Wiki
description: Internal documentation, procedures, troubleshooting guides, and IT policies

name: Payment Processing Gateway
description: Payment card processing API handling customer transactions

name: Backup Archives
description: Encrypted backups of all production systems and databases

name: Email System
description: Corporate email system for internal and external communications

name: Marketing Analytics
description: Website visitor analytics, campaign performance, and conversion tracking

name: Contract Management System
description: Customer contracts, vendor agreements, NDAs, and legal documentation

name: Security Camera Footage
description: Security camera recordings for all facility locations

name: Research Database
description: Proprietary research data, test results, product development information

name: Customer Support Tickets
description: Customer support tickets, chat logs, and issue resolution history

name: Mobile App
description: Customer-facing mobile application for account management and orders

name: Data Warehouse
description: Centralized data warehouse for business intelligence and reporting

name: HR Benefits Portal
description: Employee benefits enrollment, 401k information, health insurance data

name: Inventory Management
description: Real-time inventory tracking, warehouse management, supply chain data

name: Training Portal
description: Employee training records, certifications, and compliance training history
